name: University of Notre Dame | nativ
align: alt= Theodore Hesburgh sitting at his desk |Theodore Hesburgh, photographed in 2012, was the 15th and longest-serving president of Notre Dame. The university's president is always a priest of the Congregation of Holy Cross. The first president was Edward Sorin; and the current president is John I. Jenkins.
footer: alt= Theodore Hesburgh sitting at his desk |Theodore Hesburgh, photographed in 2012, was the 15th and longest-serving president of Notre Dame.
